entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
